titleStmt.title: An excellent table for the finding the periferies, or circumferences of all elleipses [sic] or ovals so near the truth as any mechanical practice can require / calculated with great diligence and care by Sir Jonas Moore, and not done before.
titleStmt.author: Moore, Jonas, Sir, 1617-1679.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W.G. for N. Brooke ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
